activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Sankhani mawu okudutsa kuti mulowe nawo.
Mawu ophweka omwe ali ndi mau ochepa omwe mungakumbukire mosavuta.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Sankhani wabwino chikudutsa mawu kuteteza akaunti yanu. Onani malingaliro a malingaliro ena.
activate.IfYouFeel: Ngati mukumva kuti chinachake chalakwika, mukhoza

notifications.title: Chilolezo
notifications.prompt: Kodi mukufuna kuti zidziwitso zitheke? Mudzalandira zosintha zenizeni zenizeni za zinthu zomwe mumasamala.
notifications.ForgetPass: Eya, kodi mwaiwala mawu anu ozembera?
